name: Screw the Rules!
description:
Chaos and disorder!
Fight as a tiny mage apprentices against your friends and change the rules of your environment! Throw potions to gain advantage and kick your fellow combatants out of the screen or into a deadly, unholy, pit.

You can create fire, death, ice, walls and pools of healing goo in the areas when you throw a potion on them.

Multiplayer fun for 4 people sharing one keyboard.
Advanced tipp: connect a second keyboard to have some more space - or enjoy the keyboard twister challange.

The fun never ends!

Litterally.

We forgot to include a win screen.

Edit: we managed to mostly salvage our git and uploaded a fixed version

Controls

Basic setup: movement keys and one action key per player

Player 1: WASD + Q
Player 2: Arrows + Shift
Player 3: IJKL + U
Player 4: 8456 + 7 (Numpad)
